thread.title: Automate your law firm: becoming a 24/7 law firm while working less
thread.title_full: Automate your law firm: becoming a 24/7 law firm while working less

title: Automate your law firm: becoming a 24/7 law firm while working less
text:
Automate your law firm: becoming a 24/7 law firm while working less 
There are only so many billable hours in the day. Why miss a single one? 
It has never been easier for law firms to integrate tools and services that do grunt work. Such tools free lawyers to focus on legal tasks. From hiring contractors to cover off hours to using technology to coordinate tasks and data, law firms are going from old school to uber. Join Clio in learning how automation lets firms earn fees every hour of the day, while the lawyers sleep. 
In this free, 1-hour Clio webinar, learn what you need to know about bringing automation into your law firm, including: Expanding your law firm beyond the traditional employees Using tools to automate tasks Coordinating distributed teams to maximize productivity Letting your law firm work for you Additional Information/Speakers 
Joshua Lenon, Lawyer in Residence, ClioDebbie Mignola, Founder of Intake123
